Package hr.fer.zemris.java.votingapp.dao

Class DAOException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • hr.fer.zemris.java.votingapp.dao.DAOException

  • public class DAOException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    Used to indicate an error occured when comunicating with data from the DAO layer.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public DAOException​(java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.Throwable cause,
                    boolean enableSuppression,

        Constructs a DAOException using it's error message, cause and flags to determine more detailed information.
        Parameters:
        message - - error message
        cause - - cause of the exception
        enableSuppression - - flag that determines whether or not is the suppresion enabled
        writableStackTrace - - flag that determines what type of stack trace to use.
